title: Font on my uncles boat....
content:
Here is a picture of the font of my uncles boat and I would like to embroider it on a shirt for him but can not figure out the font. Are the two pics different fonts?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725140226/http:/typophile.com/files/image_160.jpg) | 539.61 KB |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725140226/http:/typophile.com/files/image_161.jpg) | 726.6 KB |
author: Longoslogos

comments.content:
Yes the 2 fonts are different.

The first one is a (further emboldened) **[Ballantines Script Heavy](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725140226/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Elsner%2BFlake&ffam=BallantinesScriptEF%20Heavy%20-%20Regular&fid=6dac72c8b4dd7141af4b82bc09ca4f36&fsize=60&text=Size%20DOES%20Matter&fit=1)**

The 2nd one looks like an (also emboldened) **[Snell Roundhand (Black)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725140226/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Snell%20Roundhand%20-%20Black%20Script%20Italic%20Bold&fid=0657a3782492cc6c26943d9a13fbb928&fsize=60&text=Size%20DOES%20Matter&fit=1)**
Thank you so much! I had no idea how to figure this out until I found you guys...you are awesome!!!
